title: DeFi
description: Decentralized finance. Refers to financial instruments and mechanisms built on the blockchain using smart contracts. Examples include swaps, bonding curves, and escrow.

props.body: Decentralized finance. Refers to financial instruments and mechanisms built on the blockchain using smart contracts. Examples include swaps, bonding curves, and escrow.
